subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Giovanni Visconti of Italy won the snowy 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Vincenzo Nibali of Italy retained the overall lead.
snippet: Giovanni Visconti of Italy won the snowy 15th stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Vincenzo Nibali of Italy retained the overall lead.
